question:
A population of a colony of bacteria increases by 20 percent every 3 minutes. If at 9:00am the colony had a population of 144,000, what was the population of the colony at 8:54am?
(A) 100,000
(B) 112,000
(C) 120,000
(D) 121,000
(E) 136,000
